participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate, Emily enjoys expressing herself through various art forms and values her independence.
participant_1.background: I am single and live with my three cats. I'm proud of my work ethic and dedication to my craft. I am not the superstitious type, but my friends are always trying to get me to go to a fortune teller. I collect music and other things that represent my personality and interests. I'm a creative person who loves to express myself through music, drawing, and painting.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Family-oriented and adventurous, Mark is devoted to animal welfare and finds joy in traveling.
participant_2.background: I have a family who loves to celebrate Halloween. I am not into sports but I am passionate about animal welfare. I have two loves: my family and travel. I need to keep my stock market reports organized. I grew up in an orphanage, as my parents died when I was young.

content.text: I love Halloween. I get to dress up as my favorite characters. My favorite character is the Joker. What is your favorite holiday?
I love Halloween too! My family loves to dress up as a family and go trick or treating. I like to go to animal shelters on Halloween and give the animals treats.
That is so sweet. I love animals too. I have three cats.
Aww! I wish I could have a pet, but I travel a lot for my job.
I work as a graphic artist. I love creating things. What do you do for a living?
I am a stock trader. I have to keep track of my reports and make sure they are organized.
That sounds like a lot of work. Do you like it?
I do. I like being able to make my own hours and work from home.
That's great. I have to be in the office every day.
I like to go to the office sometimes, but I also like working from home.
I know what you mean. It's nice to have a change of scenery.
